item.title: CIS-Script
onAirScanner
item.description: SOURCE onAirScanner - GitHub While working from home, we all have a lot of meetings, and sometimes a family member or a roommate has no idea that you are in a meeting and they walk into the room without even a knock. Setting up a light to show when you are “ON AIR” or in a meeting is a great solution. There are several solutions out on the internet that can do this.
